name: Elemental Spell

sections.body: Choose one energy type: acid, cold, electricity, or fire. You may replace a spell's normal damage with that energy type or split the spell's damage, so that half is of that energy type and half is of its normal type. An elemental spell uses up a spell slot one level higher than the spell's actual level.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: You can gain this feat multiple times. Each time you must choose a different energy type.
sections.name: Special

description: You can manipulate the elemental nature of your spells.
